description: Try our easy to follow Baked Salmon With Salsa Verde & Cucumber recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baked Salmon With Salsa Verde & Cucumber
name: Baked Salmon With Salsa Verde & Cucumber Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, arrange the leftover salmon on a platter or 4 serving plates. Spoon the salsa verde over the fish, and place the cucumber on the side.
